title: Ep - 105 - KATHRYN DENNIS FROM SOUTHERN CHARM
description:
Kathryn Dennis from Southern Charm on Bravo explains how she was cast for the show, the unique journey she has had on the show the last few years including the birth of two children, and her new friendships with the cast. 


David Johns is the former executive director of the White House Initiative on Educational Excellence for African Americans and the Executive Director of the National Black Justice Coalition (NBJC). He reviews this week’s episode of The Real Housewives of Potomac. 


Andrew Llinares is the Executive Producer of Dancing With the Stars. He explains behind the scenes details of Dancing with The Stars: Athletes. The show’s finale airs Monday at 8pm ET on ABC. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey
